title: Sion ultimate bug
body:
Hi.
I don't know how I did it, or how to recreate it, but there's this glitch with sion ult where you don't get the fuill movement speed bonus from his ultimate. He looks like he's just mildly jogging instead of charging.

replies.body: the first second of the ult is quite slow. does it persist through the entire duration? if so could you grab a clip(replay) from your game?

My computer isn't very good so it may be laggy but here it is.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hDuSDFTXvQU&feature=youtu.be
the entire part up to where I do the final leap is all part of the ultimate. Keep in mind this was in urf and I was playing full app sion with Ludens and lichbane if that makes difference.
